SEARCH
Package net.chaossquad.mclib.dynamicevents

Klasse EventListenerManager

java.lang.Object
net.chaossquad.mclib.dynamicevents.EventListenerManager
public final class EventListenerManager extends Object
Dynamically manages event listeners.
Instead of directly registering event listeners to Bukkit, listeners are registered to a ListenerOwner.
The ListenerManager then keeps the listeners registered as long as the ListenerOwner provides them.
If not, they are unregistered.
Listeners which should not be managed by this manager has to be excepted. If not, they will be unregistered as well. Listeners of other plugins are automatically excepted.

      public void cleanupListeners()
      This method cleans up all listeners which must not exist. It is used for removing game and map listeners of games/maps which are not loaded anymore.
